restaurants.name: Mad About Pizza
restaurants.description: Delicious pizzas baked in wood-fired oven. We serve authentic Italian varieties, classic American pizzas, and desi ones too!

restaurants.name: Nachos & Tacos
restaurants.description: Hola Amigos! You have arrived at the right place to get some Mexican delicacies. Quesadillas, Burritos, variety of salsas, and much more. Yes, Nachos and Tacos goes without saying!

restaurants.name: Pind da Swaad
restaurants.description: Robust flavors from the Punjab heartland served with lots of love - that's generous amounts of butter and ghee. We also serve popular chats made with tangy chutneys and savouries.

restaurants.name: Down South
restaurants.description: Healthy breakfast options from the south of India. We serve popular South Indian tiffin items, but specialize in certain cuisines from every state of the south.

items.name: Garden Fresh Veggie Pizza
items.description: An abundance of delicious veggies with less crust - a perfect Garden Fresh Pizza! Jalapenos, Corn, Black Olives, Crunchy Bell Peppers, Tomatoes, Onion & Mozzarella Cheese on an herbed and soft 11-inch crust.

items.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
items.description: Our Margherita pizza is just about 3 things: Cheese, Cheese and more Cheese! An overload of Mozzarella Cheese finely spread on an herbed, soft 11-inch crust. Must have for every cheese lover.

items.name: Classic Burger
items.description: All your favorites - barbeque chicken, chicken patties, wrapped onion stuffed with Colby cheese and in the core of the onion ring stuffed with mashed potatoes, cucumber and lots of cheese.

items.name: Chicken Tikka Pizza
items.description: An unheard medley of tandoori tikka and melt-in-the-mouth kheema to amaze your taste buds! Classic Chicken Tikka with delicious Chicken Kheema, Onion and Mozzarella Cheese on a soft 11-inch crust.

items.name: Nachos
items.description: Fried corn tortilla chips covered with melted cheese and sliced jalape√±o peppers. We serve with lots of guacamole so you can have a feast. Among the all time favorite munchies.

items.name: Tacos
items.description: Small hand-sized corn or wheat tortilla topped with a filling of your choice - popular ones being cheese, chicken, beans and other veggies.

items.name: Burrito
items.description: A flour tortilla wrap filled with a savory filling - cooked beans, vegetables, lettuce and tomatoes, cheese, and condiments such as salsa, pico de gallo, and guacamole.

items.name: Fajitas
items.description: Grilled chicken with stripped peppers, onions, shredded lettuce, sour cream, guacamole, salsa, pico de gallo, and diced tomatoes, served on a flour or corn tortilla.

items.name: Quesadilla
items.description: Tortilla filled with cheese, spices, and veggies, and cooked on a griddle. A corn tortilla is used (authentic), but we can also make it with a flour tortilla on request.

items.name: Gajar Halwa
items.description: Grated carrots cooked with a combination of milk, sugar, milk solids (khoya), clarfied butter (ghee) and seasoned with dry fruits like raisins, cashews and pistachios. Must try for those with a sweet tooth.

items.name: Samosa
items.description: A triangular-shaped fried pastry with a savory filling of potatoes, peas cooked to a semi-mash and seasoned with spices. Served with mint and tamarind-date chutneys.

items.name: Kachori
items.description: Deep fried bread made with ground black gram (urad) and green gram (moong) combination, sauteed along with spices and filled into a cover of maida. It is fried over a slow flame making it extremely crispy and savory.

items.name: Punjabi Thali
items.description: Choose this is you cannot make up your mind! It has all the quintessential Punjabi delicacies - dal makhni, paneer butter masala, rajma, raita served with butter naan and rice. For desserts and accompaniments you get phirni and lassi.

items.name: Idly
items.description: Steamed rice and black gram (urad dal) pancake served with copious amunts of freshly ground coconut chutney tempered with mustard seasoning. One of the South Indian breakfast classics.

items.name: Masala Dosa
items.description: Thin and crispy rice and black gram (urad dal) pancake cooked over a griddle, and filled with spicy potato and onion curry that is tempered with a typical seasoning of mustard, curry leaves, green chillies and ginger.

items.name: Medu vada
items.description: Fluffy and crispy fried savory snack made of black gram batter, mixed with chillies, giner, curry leaves and asafoetida and deep-fried. Served with chutney and sambhar.

items.name: Idiappam
items.description: Steamed string hoppers made from rice and serve along with a mildly spiced and flavorful vegetable stew, and sweetened coconut milk.

items.name: Goli Baje
items.description: From the Konkan region comes this this dish of fried dough balls made from refined flour (maida) and sour curd, seasoned with ginger, green chillies, curry leaves, asafoetida. A hit among our patrons.

items.name: Poori Saagu
items.description: Thin bread made from whole wheat fried till its puffed up. It is served in Karnataka with a spicy mix vegetable curry cooked in a coconut base. Best enjoyed hot and a favorite breakfast item.

items.name: Poori Saagu
items.description: Thin bread made from whole wheat fried till its puffed up. It is served in Karnataka with a spicy mix vegetable curry cooked in a coconut base. Best enjoyed hot and a favorite breakfast item.

items.name: Poori Saagu
items.description: Thin bread made from whole wheat fried till its puffed up. It is served in Karnataka with a spicy mix vegetable curry cooked in a coconut base. Best enjoyed hot and a favorite breakfast item.
